other_title: Dirty Pair Flash: Angels at World's End
plot: Dirty Pair Flash 2 follows Kei and Yuri as they escort a 3WA computer Consultant to solve a mystery at the World's World Historical theme park.
opening_theme: "Thrill ni Koishite (Loving Thrills)" by Rica Matsumoto
ending_theme: "Kimi ga Daisuki (I Really Like You)" by Mariko Kouda
